message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000.  It's a fantastic deal, considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking for a price closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This gives us both a good deal.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,500 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
